00013 HeightSelector::HeightSelector( QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00014         : QWidget( parent, name ){
00015 
00016   setMinimumHeight(100);
00017   minValue=0;
00018   maxValue=255;
00019 
00020   handleType=HANDLE_NONE;

00030 void HeightSelector::paintEvent( QPaintEvent* evt){
00031   int y2=height()-30;
00032   int x2=width()-10;
00033 
00034   lineX1=10;
00035   lineX2=x2;
00036   lineY1=y2;
00037   lineY2=10;
00038 
00039 
00040   QPainter paint;
00041   paint.begin( this );
00042     paint.setPen( Qt::black );
00043     paint.drawLine(10,10,10,y2 );
00044     paint.drawLine(x2,10,x2,y2 );
00045     paint.drawLine(10,y2,x2,y2 );
00046 
00047     
00048     // The line
00049     paint.drawLine(10,y2,x2,10 );
00050     
00051     
00052     paint.drawText( QRect(0, y2, 30, y2+30), AlignHCenter, "0" );
00053     paint.drawText( QRect(width()-30, y2, width(), y2+30), 
00054                     AlignHCenter, "255" );
00055 
00056     drawSelection(&paint);
00057 
00058   paint.end();
00059 }
00060 
00066 void HeightSelector::drawSelection(QPainter* p){
00067     int y2=height()-30;
00068     int x2=width()-10;
00069 
00070     // Get a percent
00071     int hDev=lineY1-lineY2;
00072     int xDev=lineX2-lineX1;
00073 
00074     int minY=lineY1-((minValue*hDev)/255);
00075     int minX=((minValue*xDev)/255)+lineX1;
00076 
00077     int maxY=lineY1-((maxValue*hDev)/255);
00078     int maxX=((maxValue*xDev)/255)+lineX1;
00079 
00080 
00081     p->setPen( QPen(Qt::red, 3) );
00082     p->drawLine(minX,minY,maxX,maxY );
00083 
00084     //Handles
00085      p->setPen( QPen(Qt::red, 1) );
00086      p->drawLine(minX,minY,minX,y2-1 );
00087      p->drawLine(maxX,maxY,maxX,y2-1 );
00088 
00089 }

00096 void HeightSelector::mousePressEvent ( QMouseEvent * e ){
00097   // e->x() h&as the mouse position
00098 
00099   // Get a percent
00100   int xDev=lineX2-lineX1;
00101   int minX=((minValue*xDev)/255)+lineX1;
00102   int maxX=((maxValue*xDev)/255)+lineX1;
00103 
00104   int distMin=abs(minX-(e->x()));
00105   int distMax=abs(maxX-(e->x()));
00106 
00107   
00108 
00109   if (distMin<distMax){
00110     handleType=HANDLE_MIN;
00111   }
00112   else{
00113     handleType=HANDLE_MAX;
00114   }
00115 
00116   mouseXClick=e->x();
00117 
00118   repaint();
00119 }
00120 
00126 void HeightSelector::mouseReleaseEvent ( QMouseEvent * e ){
00127     handleType=HANDLE_NONE;
00128 
00129 }

00136 void HeightSelector::mouseDoubleClickEvent ( QMouseEvent * e ){
00137 
00138 }

00145 void HeightSelector::mouseMoveEvent ( QMouseEvent * e ){
00146 
00147   // Get a percent
00148   int xDev=lineX2-lineX1;
00149   
00150   int value=((e->x()*255)/xDev)-lineX1;
00151 
00152   if (value<0)
00153     value=0;
00154   if (value>255)
00155     value=255;
00156 
00157   if (handleType==HANDLE_MIN){
00158     minValue=value;
00159     emit(minChanged(value));
00160 
00161     repaint();
00162 
00163   }
00164   else if (handleType==HANDLE_MAX){
00165     maxValue=value;
00166     emit(maxChanged(value));
00167     repaint();
00168 
00169   }
00170 }
